channel.title: Half-Life Classic mod?
channel.description: Is there a "mod" that would replace all the new, fancy HD weaponry (featuring the Beretta, the M16...) and models with old, classic HL models (old Barneys with eyes bascially drawn onto them with a pencil, Glock, MP5...)?

item.title: Half-Life Classic mod?
item.dc:creator: M8R-3e4p0o
item.description:
Is there a “mod” that would replace all the new, fancy HD weaponry (featuring the Beretta, the M16…) and models with old, classic HL models (old Barneys with eyes bascially drawn onto them with a pencil, Glock, MP5…)?
